```{r setup}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
library(haven)
dmae <- read_sas("https://github.com/philbowsher/Foundation-of-the-R-Workflow-workshop-2019-09-06/raw/master/Examples/data/dmae.sas7bdat", 
    NULL)
dmae

```

```{r}
ggplot(dmae) +
  aes(x = SEX) +
  geom_bar(fill = "#112446") +
  theme_minimal() +
  facet_wrap(vars(ARM), scales = "free_y")

```
